content:
Who would've thought a car
could feel so cozy and homey?
Is this what having a professional color coordinator can do?

"Huozhuche"?
How strange, why did this name
just pop into my head when I saw this vehicle...
This car radiates the same fiery enthusiasm as a sizzling wok of ginger, scallions, and garlic - it must be Manna's car.

These dramatic scratches on the car have Suye written all over them.
Hah, figures! They don't even go easy on their own ride.

The way it's parked looks rather strange,
And there's a hot air balloon tether ring on top.
Could this car have been... carried here by a balloon?

This car is parked at an angle...
Could it be... intentional...?

I suddenly want to take a nap inside,
The color of this car looks so cozy

The damage on this car is excessive,
looks like it was done deliberately...

A rebellious spirit shown through deliberately parking outside the lines...
Oh, it's Rebella's car.

Is this little car parked here
trying to give me a jump scare?
